comments_since_last_sample.body: Hey Chris. Good call-out on organ harvesting.
I made sure to watch all of squid game before watching this episode to make sure this didn't spoil it for me.
I'm sure it's easy to live into your 90s when you have 20yo organs...
Also reveals the whole reason for the people tracker, it's basically an organ harvesters catalogue to browse targets

I just wanna note; Slobodan Milosevic really was not that much of a dictator {albeit I still don't support his more. . .AHEM, Authoritarian way of rule} and as far as I am aware, Milosevic won his case post-mortem?
